question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your friend Alice has just come back from Australia as an exchange student. Ask her two questions about her experience in Australia.

std.value: How long was the exchange program? Where did you stay in Australia?
std.ai: How long was the exchange program? Where did you stay in Australia?

std.value: What did you do in Australia? How many students took part in the exchange program?
std.ai: What did you do in Australia? How many students took part in the exchange program?

std.value: What do you think of the people there? What have you learned from your experience?
std.ai: What do you think of the people there? What have you learned from your experience?

std.value: How was the weather in Australia? Was it fun?
std.ai: How was the weather in Australia? Was it fun?

std.value: Did you experience any culture shock? What do you think of the people there?
